text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Please go ahead with more 14 days lockdown. We know it is hard for everyone but it is needed. India still far behind the virus in terms of testing and tracking. Opening the lockdown will ruin last 3 week work. @drharshvardhan @HMOIndia @mygovindia #COVID19 #IndiaFightsCorona
